titles.title: It could happen in a moment

properties.verseOrder: v1 v1 c1 v1 c1 v1 v2 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 v1 c1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: It could happen in a moment,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: In the twinkling of an eye,

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: He could break the Eastern sky,

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: Tho our hearts will feel unworthy,

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: Yet how happy we will be

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: When the Savior comes from heaven,

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines: When His blessed face we see.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: I am list'ning ev'ry moment

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: For the mighty trumpet sound,

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: What a time we'll have together

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: When the saints shall leave the ground.

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: All our toiling will be over,

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: All our sorrow and its pain,

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: Jesus Christ could come again.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Any minute of the day,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: He could call us home to heaven,

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: There forevermore to stay,

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: "Hold the fort" a little longer in your struggle over sin,

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: Trust the great Commander's promise:

verse.name: v2f
verse.lines: He will surely come again.

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: Jesus Christ could come again!
